Description:
Control the Stem Player with your Stream Deck. "Stem Player for Stream Deck" is a specially designed software aimed at controlling music stems (individual parts of a music track such as bass, drums, vocals, etc.) via the popular Stream Deck interface. This integration allows users to control, mix and manipulate elements of a song in real time.

This software is just the Stream Deck Plugin. You need the Stem Player software too to use it. A free download is available at the helpful links below.
Name: Stem Player
